creator: dariusz.dudek@pentacomp.com.pl
text:
I am executing simply sql "select * from table".
I'm using INFORMIX 9.3, JDBC Driver Version 2.21.JC5.

I think there is unnecessary method call "statement.getResultSet()".

StackTrace:
StackTrace:
D:\dad\cbdu3\tools\build.xml:112: java.sql.SQLException: Method can be called on
ly once.

        at org.apache.tools.ant.launch.Launcher.main(Launcher.java:56)
Caused by: java.sql.SQLException: Method can be called only once.

(SQLExec.java:630)

(SQLExec.java:605)

text:
I think this is a duplicate of bug report 27162.
27162 is solved in ant 1.6.2.
Can you try to upgrade to ant 1.6.2 and see if it solves your problem ?
Cheers,
Antoine

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 27162 ***
creator: antoine@apache.org
